column2: Prefers to follow in other people's footsteps rather than initiate actions. Can be relied on to come up with the goods as long as someone else has the initial ideas. Survival mechanisms are weak.
Enjoys challenge and action, and becomes frustrated when there is no recourse for change. Expects others to also rise to a challenge.
Likes to flit from one thing to another, finding it difficult to settle down. Enjoys change, although lacks the stability needed to see things through.
Does not enjoy change. Expects others to be reliable.
Finds it difficult to adapt to new situations. Tends to be inflexible when faced with the demands of change and other people.
May procrastinate. Expects others to be flexible.
